concept.title: API elements for ad playback
concept.shortdesc: provides classes and methods you can use to customize the playback behavior of content that contains advertising.

conbody.p:
The following API elements are useful for customizing playback: Q: Are there iOS equivs for the AdBreakPolicy and AdPolicy that are in other platforms?
API element
Content that supports advertising
PTAdMetadata
Control whether an ad break should be marked as having been watched by a viewer, and if yes, when to mark it. Set and get the watched policy using adBreakAsWatched property.
PTAdPolicySelector Protocol that allows customization of ad behavior.
PTDefaultAdPolicySelector
Class that implements the default behavior. Your application can override this class to customize the default behaviors without implementing the complete interface.
PTMediaPlayer
localTime.
This is the local time of the playback, excluding the placed ad breaks.
seekToLocalTime .
Here, the seek occurs relative to a local time in the stream.
getTimeline.convertToLocalTime.
The virtual position on the timeline is converted to the local position.
PTAdBreak
isWatched property. Indicates whether the viewer has watched the ad.
